channel.title: How to make a copy and paste tuturial!
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]How to make a C&P Tutorial! (Surprisingly, this wasn't copy and pasted![/size][/center]
1. If the site isn't a forum, skip to step three, if not, continue to two. 2. Once you found a good tutorial, register on the forums. Then, quote the post by clicking quote and take out the [quote ] [ /quote] tags. 3. Highlight the tutorial. 4. Press copy. 5. Press paste on the text field where you are posting the tutorial. 6. Post the thread! You now are a complete rep hungry noob who just C&P'd a tut!

item.title: How to make a copy and paste tuturial!
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[center][size=15pt]How to make a C&P Tutorial! (Surprisingly, this wasn’t copy and pasted![/size][/center]

  1. If the site isn’t a forum, skip to step three, if not, continue to two.
  2. Once you found a good tutorial, register on the forums. Then, quote the post by clicking quote and take out the [quote ] [ /quote] tags.
  3. Highlight the tutorial.
  4. Press copy.
  5. Press paste on the text field where you are posting the tutorial.
  6. Post the thread! You now are a complete rep hungry noob who just C&P’d a tut!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a copy and paste tuturial!
